Hi all, I'm currently having some issues with some black textures on the space plane technologies parts and have no idea why.

https://imgur.com/2p1FcI4

Ahh, yeah that doesn't look right. The only advice I have is to delete the mod from your game data folder, it should just be the Cormorant Aeronology folder. Then re-install from a fresh download.

I'm having a the same issue as well as a few orhers. Did a fresh install the other day as well, something is up with the parts from meep

I remember that I figured out a way how to fix it, but I can't exactly remember what I did. I think that I took some of the files from the Mr Meeb folder and replaced the ones in the cormorant aeronology folder, perhaps editing the configs to change the file paths.

I'll have to fiddle around with it again to try to figure out what I did.

im thinking of trying to install the full pack and hope the textures are fixed.

@Pak

I took the liberty to patch a patch (the: "CA_2-5x_scale.cfg"). There was an error in there which caused the patch to not apply to the SRBs. Hope it's useful!

Spoiler 

//Cormorant Shuttle Pack 2.5x Rescale

@PART[ShuttleBottomLong]
{
	@MODULE[FSfuelSwitch]
	{
		@resourceAmounts = 2800;720,880;1200;1320
	}
}

@PART[ShuttleB]
{
	@MODULE[FSfuelSwitch]
	{
		@resourceAmounts = 2800;360,440;600;660
	}
}

@PART[CA_ETnose],[CA_ET_extension]
{
	@MODULE[FSfuelSwitch]
	{
		@resourceAmounts = 28800;9600,11740
	}
}

@PART[CA_ET]
{
	@MODULE[FSfuelSwitch]
	{
		@resourceAmounts = 35200;19200,23470
	}
}

@PART[CA_SRB4]
{

	@MODULE[ModuleEnginesFX]
	{
		@maxThrust = 3500
	}

	@RESOURCE[SolidFuel]
	{
		@amount = 14000
		@maxAmount = 14000
	}
}

@PART[CA_STME]
{

	@MODULE[ModuleEnginesFX]
	{
		@maxThrust = 1000
	}
}

@PART[CA_SRBnose]
{

	@MODULE[ModuleEngines]
	{
		@maxThrust = 55
	}

	@RESOURCE[SolidFuel]
	{
		@amount = 18
		@maxAmount = 18
	}
}

@PART[CA_boosterPack]
{

	@MODULE[ModuleEngines]
	{
		@maxThrust = 80
	}

	@RESOURCE[SolidFuel]
	{
		@amount = 10
		@maxAmount = 10
	}
}

 

Oh and btw, love what you have created here!
Will this ever be Compatible with Mechjeb?(Work with Mechjeb Ascent guidance)

1 hour ago, Kroslev Kerman said:

Will this ever be Compatible with Mechjeb?(Work with Mechjeb Ascent guidance)

What do you mean? It is compatible with MJ and it works well with ascent guidance. If you have a problem with MJ you must check the design of your Shuttle. It is known that the ascent guidance of MJ has some problems with shuttledesigns as it is made for normal launchers. It is not related to Cormorant as itself. So you must contact the MJ guys.

7 hours ago, Kroslev Kerman said:

Will this ever be Compatible with Mechjeb?(Work with Mechjeb Ascent guidance)

Did you search this thread before asking that?  I have a video clearly showing this craft ascending using nothing but MechJeb.

It seems to me that only the parts from Shuttle Payload Tech are missing textures,at least the spacelab parts.
I believe that the payload tech parts were made by Mr.Meeb and with permission packed in by Pak, but i dont know if Pak has updated the textures as the Mr.Meebs latest release is for 1.2.

4 hours ago, Amahlaka said:

It seems to me that only the parts from Shuttle Payload Tech are missing textures,at least the spacelab parts.
I believe that the payload tech parts were made by Mr.Meeb and with permission packed in by Pak, but i dont know if Pak has updated the textures as the Mr.Meebs latest release is for 1.2.
 

There is no need for updating the textures. If you correctly install this pack all parts will work nice and show in VAB/SPH.

I docked a shuttle to my station yesterday, and it took 10 minutes of quickloading and messing around with SAS modes. Because the docking port on a shuttle is at the front of the cargo bay, it's off-axis and that makes it really annoying to dock. Does anyone have a working method that you are willing to share for docking a CA shuttle to a space station?

Also, a side note: The new manoeuvre node system introduced in 1.5 seems to disagree with the monopropellant OMS engines in this mod, but I think a lot of the issues with that new system are going to be fixed in 1.6.
Please help, how to instal for 1.5.1 version?

16 hours ago, KSpaceR said:

Please help, how to instal for 1.5.1 version?

 

Extract the mod’s zip file: there should be a GameData folder in there. You want to put the contents of that folder into your KSP directory’s GameData.

So the folder structure should look like this: KSP > GameData > Cormorant Aeronology, Module Manager, Firespitter Core, Squad, SquadExpansion (if you have the DLC)

I hope that made sense, and welcome to the forums!

Edited December 17, 2018 by RealKerbal3x
Does this mod work with earlier versions of ksp? such as 1.4.2. Because I downloaded it and had problems with textures on certain parts.

7 hours ago, true.wizardry said:

Does this mod work with earlier versions of ksp? such as 1.4.2. Because I downloaded it and had problems with textures on certain parts.

You’ll need the specific versions of Firespitter and Module Manager for the version you’re using.
